full_text: The shift towards online working has been good for the planet—videoconferencing uses less than a tenth the energy required for in-person meetings  https://t.co/eXFuSlsbws

localize.full_text: オンライン・ワークへのシフトは地球にも優しく、ビデオ会議のエネルギー消費量は対面式の会議に比べて10分の1以下です。https://t.co/eXFuSlsbws
